data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Jiaxing against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jiaxing, Zhejiang, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 341,375 believers in Jiaxing to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Jiaxing, Zhejiang, China that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 4,085,928 who are far from you in Jiaxing, Zhejiang, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the She people.
Lord, the believers in the county of Jiaxing, Zhejiang, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Jiaxing, Zhejiang, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 4,500,000 citizens of Jiaxing, Zhejiang, China, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

location.name: Jiaxing
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Huizhou, Deaf, Han Chinese, Wu, Han Chinese, Min Bei
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Huizhou (5,395,000), Deaf (7,196,000), Han Chinese, Wu (95,092,000), Han Chinese, Min Bei (3,008,000)
